issue.title: [R] Refactor r/configure
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13464](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13464). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
r/configure is hard to read through quickly and understand as there is a lot going on in that script.

If it was refactored to perhaps use functions or even just add in more comments to be explicit about what different sections are doing, it would be easier for developers to work with and understand
